channel.title: Underworld Development team is recruiting
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt]Underworld Development team[/size][/b] [img]http://img260.imageshack.us/img260/6515/uwdtlogonz1.gif[/img][/center] [center][b]Today I am starting Out a new Project wich will be to create a 'second' RuneScape In private servers However, It's a lot to do, and for that I am Recruiting People.[/b][/center] [b]What I am thinking of doing first:[/b] [ul][li]NPC Placing Development: [list] [li]Main Cities[/li] [li]Non-Main Cities[/li] [li]World[/li] [li]Dungeons[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Shops[list] [li]Main Cities[/li] [li]Non-Main Cities[/li] [li]Other Places(Guilds,Mini Games)[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Quests Development:[list] [li](first)Non-Member quests[/li] [/list][/li][/ul] [b]If these Are done, Other development can start[/b] [b]Please note: Only help with Real things alike rs, The addons Only come when all the work is done[/b] [center][b]Wishing to join the Development Team?[/b][/center] [i][b]1. Put it in a reply:[/b][/i] [b]Name: What you Would like to Develop:[/b] [i][b]2. Any Questions?:[/b][/i] ask freely by sending me a pm Or I also Answer in this threath. [i][b]3. Tutorials That Already have NPCs, Shops,...:[/b][/i] You Can PM to me or put it in a reply [center][url=http://www.freewebs.com/anubisfantasy]Development Site: Click here[/url][/center]
Progress: ATM placing every single NPC in the Non-Member Cities Lumbridge: Done Al-kharid: Done Draynor: Done Port Sarim: Done Rimmington: Done Varrock: Done Barbarian Village: Done Edgeville: Done Falador: Done Karamja: Done Progress: making all objects work (doors, stairs, stalls) like real rs Lumbridge: Progress Karamja: -Await- Al-kharid: -Await- Draynor: -Await- Port Sarim: -Await- Rimmington: -Await- Varrock: -Await- Barbarian Village: -Await- Edgeville: -Await- Falador: -Await-
[b]This is it, for the moment. I'd be happy if anyone helps :)[/b]

item.title: Underworld Development team is recruiting
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

[quote=“I 0ne H1t K0, post:11, topic:108084”]Mm I Can Do

Shops

Main Cities And Non Main Cities

And I Can Also Do

Npc Placing Development

Again Main Cities And Non Main Cities…[/quote]
Let’s give you a job of the shops

can you make these shops:
Horvik’s Armory
The champions Guild (scavvo, valeine)
Cloth shops {Thessalia’s Cloth shop; Fancy dress shop}
zaff’s staffs
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Underworld Development team is recruiting
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

sic pure:

What exactly are you trying to create?

RuneScape, only in private servers, then when I have that, I will make the World A private server again, only by modifying the shops
and some other things. it will create the most full private server, normally, when I have the Normal RS first, i’m gonna release,
and i will make the server able to play with 458 Clients.

hartman:

i will create shops in the main citites…please tell me what shops you would like and what you would and would not like in them.

If you can make Bob’s Axes (Lumbridge) shop as an example, I will further tell you what you can do to help
in the shops, their must be the same Items as Real RS,
Here you can find the data of the shops

Tnx

Read full topic

item.title: Underworld Development team is recruiting
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Underworld Development team[/size]
[/center]

[center]Today I am starting Out a new Project wich will be to create a ‘second’ RuneScape In private servers
However, It’s a lot to do, and for that I am Recruiting People.[/center]

What I am thinking of doing first:

[ul][li]NPC Placing Development:
[list]
[li]Main Cities[/li]
[li]Non-Main Cities[/li]
[li]World[/li]
[li]Dungeons[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li]Shops[list]
[li]Main Cities[/li]
[li]Non-Main Cities[/li]
[li]Other Places(Guilds,Mini Games)[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li]Quests Development:[list]
liNon-Member quests[/li]
[/list][/li][/ul]

If these Are done, Other development can start

Please note: Only help with Real things alike rs, The addons Only come when all the work is done

[center]Wishing to join the Development Team?[/center]
1. Put it in a reply:
Name:
What you Would like to Develop:

2. Any Questions?:
ask freely by sending me a pm Or I also Answer in this threath.

3. Tutorials That Already have NPCs, Shops,…:
You Can PM to me or put it in a reply

[center]Development Site: Click here[/center]

Progress: ATM placing every single NPC in the Non-Member Cities Lumbridge: Done Al-kharid: Done Draynor: Done Port Sarim: Done Rimmington: Done Varrock: Done Barbarian Village: Done Edgeville: Done Falador: Done Karamja: Done

Progress: making all objects work (doors, stairs, stalls) like real rs
Lumbridge: Progress

Karamja: -Await-
Al-kharid: -Await-
Draynor: -Await-
Port Sarim: -Await-
Rimmington: -Await-
Varrock: -Await-
Barbarian Village: -Await-
Edgeville: -Await-
Falador: -Await-

This is it, for the moment.
I’d be happy if anyone helps

Read full topic
